name: TDS (Temichka)
description:
A little top-down dungeon crawler I did as a study project. Go on an expedition to deadly castle, filled with all kinds of monsters!

Used assets:
Sprites - Spritesheets by 0x72 - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii, as well as modifications of those sprites made by other creators, you can find them on the page as well. Some are made by myself!
OST - Soundtrack in its entirety is made by Defrini. No affiliation, just liked it. Check him out: https://soundcloud.com/defrini 

Will be updated in the future, probably...
You can tell your future update suggestions and / or bug complaints (I tried my hardest to fix everything, I swearrr) in the comment section!
